name: Surprise (ZoR Dev)
description:
TW: This is probably the worst game you've ever played.

What if I told you that somewhere, in this strange world, there is someone trying its best to create all assets of his game? Well, it's me!

And what if he made a special surprise for Yogscast Game Jam 2020?
Two mini-games, strangely stupid and somewhat fun (or not, it's up to you to decide), all made from scratch in less than a day? (yeah the YGJ lasted more)

What if I told you that without any skills in sound design and assets creation, this game was made by one person, all alone?
I know what you're thinking. It must be awful. And you'd be right.

I hope you'll enjoy hating me for not having skilled people in my team.

Game made with Godot Engine v3.2.3, using only GDScript.
